greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (f(q)^5 / f(q^5) - 1) / 5 in powers of q where f() is a Ramanujan theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) := Prod_{k>=1} (1-(-q)^k) (see A121373), phi(q) := theta_3(q) := Sum_{k=-oo..oo} q^(k^2) (A000122), psi(q) := Sum_{k=0..oo} q^(k*(k+1)/2) (A010054), chi(q) := Prod_{k>=0} (1+q^(2k+1)) (A000700).
link: Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, -(-1)^n * sumdiv(n, d, d * kronecker(5, d)))}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (eta(-x + A)^5 / eta(-x^5 + A) - 1) / 5, n))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Mar 21 2008
